patchNotes.title: The Konqueror's Arrival
highlights: New Champion: Shao Kahn, The Konqueror
Various bug fixes and performance improvements

content.title: The Konqueror
content.description: A ruthless emperor who crushes his enemies with overwhelming force and dominance

abilities.name: Passive - Emperor's Might
abilities.description: Buffs on Shao Kahn have doubled duration time.

abilities.name: Q - Hammer Smash
abilities.description: Shao Kahn smashes the ground with his hammer close to himself in a circle. Enemies in the area take [80/125/225/400/555 + (50%AD)] damage and are stunned for [1.2s].

abilities.name: W - Hornbutt
abilities.description: Shao Kahn charges forward with [55%] increased movement speed. The first enemy hit by the charge takes [200%AD] damage and is stunned for [1s]. If the ability hits an enemy, Shao Kahn gains [10% damage reduction] for 5s.

abilities.name: E - Emperor's Shield
abilities.description: Shao Kahn gains [30% MaxHP] shield for himself and can't be CC-d for [5s]. If the shield expires, he gains 20%AD for 5s.

abilities.name: R - Swirling Hammer
abilities.description: Shao Kahn spins around with his hammer for maximum of [3s]. The range of the ability depends on the spinning time. He throws the hammer in the targeted direction, hitting the first enemy and every other enemy near that and stunning them for 1s, reducing their damage reduction by [10%] and dealing [355/500/600 + 100%AD] damage to them.

changes: Jaguar Form movement speed bonus reduced from 50% to 45%
Sun Blade Fury cooldown reduced from 85s to 80s
Shield of Apathy damage reduction reduced from 80% to 75%
Soul Revenant healing increased from [4%/6%/7%/7%/8%] to [5%/7%/8%/8%/9%]

sections.title: Bug Fixes
content: Fixed an issue where certain abilities would not properly apply crowd control effects
Fixed a visual bug with Kotal Kahn's Sunlight ability
Improved performance in team fights with multiple particle effects
Fixed an issue where some skins would have incorrect animations
